title: INS विक्रांत की पूजा करते पूर्व रक्षा मंत्री की पत्नी का पुराना वीडियो “ईसाई दीक्षा” के रूप में साझा
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Former Defence Minister A.K Anthony’s wife Elizabeth drew a cross on INS Vikrant and Baptised it during its launch…. no one had any problem.. Hallelujah!!! pic.twitter.com/34nauFgRid
